enWisdom: The best people in fulfilling the rights of others are the best in their [following of] Islam

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلْإِسْلَامِ غَايَةً فَانْتَهُوا إِلَى غَايَتِهِ وَاخْرُجُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ مِمَّا افْتَرَضَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ حُقُوقِهِ
enWisdom: Verily Islam has a goal, so strive towards its goal and proceed towards Allah by fulfilling that which He has ordained upon you of His rights

Wisdom: تَبْصِرَةٌ لِمَنْ عَزَمَ وَآيَةٌ لِمَنْ تَوَسَّمَ وَعِبْرَةٌ لِمَنِ اتَّعَظَ وَنَجَاةٌ لِمَنْ صَدَّقَ
enWisdom: And he (‘a) said about Islam: It is an instruction for the resolute, a sign for the one who examines it [carefully], a lesson for the one who takes heed and a salvation for the one who accepts it

Wisdom: نَجَا مَنْ صَدَقَ إِيمَانُهُ وَهُدِيَ مَنْ حَسُنَ إِسْلَامُهُ
enWisdom: One whose faith is true is saved, and one whose submission is complete is guided
There is no faith better than surrendering to the will of Allah
There is no fortress better fortified than Islam

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى إِيمَانِ الرَّجُلِ بِالتَّسْلِيمِ وَلُزُومِ الطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: The faith of a man is deduced by his submission and obedience [to Allah]
